game_description: Three axes of rotation and three axes of velocity! Feel the freedom of movement as you spin, float, and bounce off asteroids in this spaceship asteroid simulator.
review_1: I cant stop playing this game, its super fun but it would be so much funnier with voice chat and if you could play with other people.
review_2: I made it, so take this review with a grain of salt, but I think it's awesome :D
